column4: I am getting this error while installing packages "Waiting for other software manager to quit"..Can anyone help?
do you have synaptic ot the ubuntu software center open?
then it maybe a lock. check in system-->Administration-->system monitor
anything that says apt-get or synaptic?
I have checked but no such process
well you can open a terminal and type as root rm /var/lib/dpkg/lock
this should remove the lock that you are talking about
Actually what the above command will do?
it removes any lock on dpkg that you might have
because you can only run one instance of apt-get
so if this crashes or whatever it might leave the lock on and just shut down the gui or whatever
